function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Provincialization of smart city in South Africa and India","Impact":"Uncoordinated response to pandemic, potential for higher transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Coordinate provincial smart city efforts, integrate pandemic preparedness into smart city planning","Technologies":"IoT, data analytics for monitoring and surveillance","People":"Residents of South Africa and India, public health authorities","Owner":"Government, smart city planners"},{"Description":"Global distribution of research team","Impact":"Risk of cross-border transmission, varied response to pandemic","Mitigation":"Adhere to international travel restrictions, implement consistent pandemic measures","Technologies":"Teleconferencing, virtual collaboration tools","People":"Research team members, international travelers","Owner":"Research team, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Integration of smart city technologies with pandemic response","Impact":"Ineffective use of smart city infrastructure for pandemic control","Mitigation":"Adapt smart city technologies for pandemic monitoring and response","Technologies":"IoT, data analytics, AI for predictive modeling","People":"Residents, government agencies, healthcare providers","Owner":"Smart city developers, government"}]}
